Package controllers

Interface SuggestionControlInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
SuggestionController
public interface SuggestionControlInterface
Represents the SuggestionControlInterface to be implemented by SuggestionController
Since:
2021-11-24
Version:
1.1
Author:
Teo Xuan Ming

  • Method Details

    • add

      int add(Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object> suggestion, String rationale) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Creates a new suggestion, each suggestion contains only one aspect of CampInfo @see CampInfo i.e. Multiple suggestions are separate entries in the suggestions HashMap adds it to the list of suggestions in MainController's attributes also tags the suggestion to the camp and user
      Parameters:
      suggestion - the suggestion aspect text to be added
      rationale - the rationale for the suggestion
      Returns:
      the suggestion id if successful
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the camp or user is not found

    • edit

      int edit(int id, Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object> edited, String rationale) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Edit a suggestion based on the suggestion id Updates the suggestion aspect and rationale Updates the last updated date
      Parameters:
      id - the suggestion id to be edited
      edited - the new suggestion aspect object
      rationale - the new rationale
      Returns:
      the suggestion id if successful throws controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the suggestion cannot be found

    • get

      Map.Entry<Map.Entry<CampAspect,? extends Object>,String> get(int suggestionid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Gets a suggestion by its id
      Parameters:
      suggestionid - the suggestion id to be retrieved
      Returns:
      the suggestion object if successful, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the suggestion cannot be found

    • delete

      Boolean delete(int suggestionid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Delete a suggestion based on the suggestion id
      Parameters:
      suggestionid - the suggestion id to be deleted
      Returns:
      true if successful, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the suggestion cannot be found

    • finalise

      Boolean finalise(int suggestionid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Sets a suggestion to be accepted so that the suggestion is finalised
      Parameters:
      suggestionid - the suggestion id to be finalised
      Returns:
      true if successful, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the suggestion cannot be found

    • isEditable

      Boolean isEditable(int suggestionid) throws ControllerItemMissingException
      Checks if a suggestion is editable based on the suggestion's accepted status If the suggestion is accepted, it is not editable
      Parameters:
      suggestionid - the suggestion id to be checked
      Returns:
      true if editable, controller item missing exception if not
      Throws:
      ControllerItemMissingException - if the suggestion cannot be found
